comment: Professor Moses is the best choir director! He is very talented and knowledgeable. He helps us students put on a great Gospel Choir concert each semester and expects a lot from us. He is very caring and respected among the school of music.
Dr.Moses is very passionate about his classes and music. He is a little hard to understand but very sweet. If you take his class seriously you will pass.
Dr. Moses is a good professor and helpful. Do have listening music pieces at home for tests and he tries to help anyway he can and he's very nice as well.

His notes are SO confusing, and his classes are so hard to get through. He knows a lot and is very talented, but I do not think he is a good teacher. I would not take him!! He is not very helpful, but as long as you do the listening, the homework, and go to class you should at least be able to receive a B.
DO NOT TAKE!!!! his notes are so disorganized and confusing. so many grammar mistakes! he's not helpful AT ALL. i hardly pulled a B because the listening portions of his tests are so confusing...

His notes are nearly impossible to understand.  They're all full of grammar mistakes and misspellings and one day he had half of the notes missing!  Also some of the stuff he puts on the test wasn't on the notes OR discussed in class (and I was in class every day).  I recommend someone else for this class.

People say he is okay, and he seems really nice from a class standpoint but 1 on 1 he is a jerk and he was a jerk to me. cant go into details but I was so suprised how a man who comes from a profession were everyone is respected, or atleast given a chance, could treat someone like such dirt. He makes music 1107 hard because he cant teach.
THIS IS THE BEST TEACHER EVER!!! Doc. Moses is strict on attendance but it takes A LOT for it to actually effect your grade. Just come to class and do whats needed and you'll be good :)

I took 2 tests and got low C's on both.  The first I didn't study for so that's my fault.  The 2nd I studied for hours.  He reads from notes that are misspelled or has grammatical errors.  He's a doctor...there should be none.  Very hard and super strict on attendance.

I am sure Dr. Moses is a wonderful voice and choir teacher but he has no idea what he is doing when he gets into a classroom and has to tech from a book.  His notes make no grammatical sense and he spends half his time trying to figure out how to use the computer.  Overall the information is easy but he makes everything confusing.

If music isn't your passion, 1107 is going to be more work than you would like. But considering the class for what it is, I thought Dr. Moses did a great job teaching it. And he is very helpful. Honestly, I don't believe the person who said he wouldn't accept their doctor's note. I missed a test without any documentation, and he let me make it up.

I used rate my professor to choose dr. moses for this class. I was UNIMPRESSED by his teaching...he takes everything WAY to seriously and if you miss class more than a few times he automatically fail. I was hospitalized and he didnt accept my doctor's notes. The tests are so hard...most of the stuff on them wasnt discussed in class. DO NOT TAKE!!!!

His attendance policy is a joke and if you want to leave class early he'll go back and count you absent. I wasn't impressed at all with the class or the prof. He can be a smartass at times and reads from his notes the whole class. I'm hoping to get a B in this class bc he takes it WAY too seriously for it to be an elective.

Dr. Moses' class was pretty easy.  The whole class is straight lecture, and the test questions come straight from the notes.  If you miss more than 3 classes you fail.  There are some random questions on the test but they are all covered in the notes.  You have to attend 3 concerts and write a one page paper on each, which boosts your grade (25%).

He is one of the best teachers that I have ever had. I love Dr. Moses. He is extremely talented and he knows his music. Gospel Choir was the high light of my week. He is AWESOME!!! if you ever have the opportunity take him. he is anointed and a true blessing to all he teaches.
Great teacher! He loves what he does! A real blessing!
I love Gospel Choir and Dr moses it so wonderful and talented love the class
Dr. Moses is freakin awesome!!
Great! You'll love him!
Excellent teacher (extremely talented, too).  Highly recommend.
Excellent and talented!! Easy tests and fun class!!
Good teacher, easy tests! What more could you ask for?
